steps.description: Avoid alcohol and caffeine on the day of your appointment. If you feel hungry , eat a light meal 30â€™ before your session, but not immediately before treatment.
steps.title: Before Your Visit
What to Wear
steps.description: Wear loose, comfortable clothing that can be easily rolled up to expose your arms and legs. Avoid tight-fitting clothes or complicated outfits.

Please plan to take it easy after your session. Do not swim in a public pool the day after treatment. Feeling tired is normal, and you may take a nap if needed. Avoid strenuous activity for at least two hours, and avoid alcohol and heavy meals for at least one hour following treatment to maximize the benefits.
steps.title: After Treatment
